hero.title: Go Green with the Force of Renewable Energy
hero.subtitle: Leading the Solar Energy Revolution. 100% Eco-Conscious, 100% Innovative.

project6.note: supplied design and engineering of the solar power plants

card1.title: Building a Leading Solar Portfolio in the Czech Republic
card1.text: Company has focused to develop significant portfolio of solar power plants in the Czech Republic to reflect the high demand for renewable energy as well as to respond to the energy market development.

card2.title: Years Proven Track Record
card2.text: With over 1.2 GWp in solar power plant projects developed across multiple countries, the company has established a strong presence in the global renewable energy market.

card3.title: Group Currently Owns and Operates PV of 33MWp
card3.text: In the Czech Republic, a total of 7 MWp was developed, followed by 6 MWp in Romania. Additionally, a 20 MWp project, financed by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), was completed in Ukraine.
